nodes.text: The Mobquet Flare-V swoop bike was a type of swoop that was produced by Mobquet Swoops and Speeders. The bike was extremely fast and infamously tough to fly, which made it rather dangerous. It was often used by pirates and other criminals. Lor Keln, the founder of the Crimson Kreehawks, used a Mobquet Flare-V swoop bike.
